data.title: ARC Centre of Excellence for 21st Century Weather
data.meta_description: We research how Australia’s weather is being reshaped by climate change
data.meta_site_name: ARC Centre of Excellence for 21st Century Weather
data.text:
Media Enquiries

Our researchers are available for comment and interviews related to the centre’s science. Get in touch with our Engagement and Impact Team via hello@21centuryweather.org.au

Funding

The centre is generously funded by the Australian Research Council’s Centres of Excellence Scheme with cash and in-kind contributions from our partners.
